patthana24.11:1.1: Naappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana24.11:2.1: Naappaccayaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
patthana24.11:3.1: Nasanidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana24.11:4.1: Nasanidassanaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:5.1: Nasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana24.11:6.1: Nasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:7.1: Narūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:8.1: Narūpiṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:9.1: Nalokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.11:10.1: Nalokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana24.11:11.1: Nalokiyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.11:12.1: Nalokuttaraṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana24.11:13.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana24.11:14.1: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
